participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Imaginative and a bit whimsical, Luna often feels misunderstood but has a playful spirit.
participant_1.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i live in the cloud.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, George loves to share stories and enjoys simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.
